comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I'd guess this was taken on May Day also, judging from the maypoles in the background.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: It appears that the Public Schools Athletic League (of New York City) had a festival every summer (in May or June) at which the maypoles featured and thousands of schoolgirls danced. I found NYT articles for 1911 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A0CEED91031E233A... 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9906E7DA103BE633A... 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E03E7DA1F39E633A... 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E02E1D91539E333A...
